extendedInfo.description: Have you missed your favorite Hindi TV serial or specific episode and wanted to watch it only when you are free, don't worry we got it for you.This app lets you watch all major Hindi TV shows and serials on your Mobiles and Tablets and especially when you want to watch it. This lets you carry ahandy TV in your pocket for watching daily shows.App Features:-- Over 40 Tv channels with over 130 Hindi daily Tv shows and serials, which include star, zee  and many more-- For easy navigation you can book mark your favorite serial or a TV show or an episode.-- If a serial has multiple seasons , you can watch based on your preference right from season 1.-- Load more older serials feature available-- shows list arranged in descending order, starting from the latest show.::: Star Plus TV :::| Arjun | Diya Aur Baati Hum | Ek Doosre Se Karte Hai Pyaar Hum | Ek Hazaaron Mein Meri Behna Hain | Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon | Kaali - Ek Punaravtar | Lakhon Mein Ek | Nach Baliye 5 | Ruk Jana Nahin and all::: Zee TV :::| Aaj Ki Housewife Hai | Hitler Didi | Indias Best Dramebaaz | Shabaash India Childrens Special and all::: Sony TV :::| Adaalat | Amita Ka Amit | Anamika | Bade Ache Lagte Hain | CID and alland all Serials, Shows & Programs in the following Hindi TV Channel are available to watch:Tv Channels available are as follows: Star Plus TV, Zee TV, Sony TV, Sahara One TV, Colors TVSab Tv, MTV India TV, Channel V TV, Bindass TV, Life Ok, CineVistaas Tv, Care World TV, Fashion TVAnd Many More.REQUIREMENTS : You can use 2G/3G or Wifi connection to enjoy this application.The application will play the shows in youtube app as directed by google policies. And this is NOT live streaming app.DISCLAIMER: The content provided in this app is hosted by youtube and is available in public domain. We do not upload any video to youtubehence we do not have the right to remove it, if you find any copyright issues with the content please follow the youtube protocol.In order to give you a free app and keep developing more free apps in the future, we are integrating a search tool to our application.This will add a few access points to your device (hence the permissions) to direct you to the web search service.Please consider using the search to help us keep creating apps.You may delete the search icon, bookmark and homepage easily. Thank you.

reviews.title: Small screen
reviews.comment: Apps is very good. But screen is very small. If you make the screen as big as Sony Liv ; 100%  i rate 5 stars.
